column1: Kata Robata////Located at the crossroads of the bustling Richmond Avenue and Kirby Drive
column2: the contemporary Japanese restaurant Kata Robata is a well-known name to anyone who is familiar with the Houston dining scene. Widely acclaimed by the local media since 2011
column3: Kata Robata delivers a fine-dining Japanese culinary experience that is immensely popular judging by the constantly-packed setting despite the restaurant's high price range. To encourage patrons who are more budget-conscious to try its award-winning food
column4: the restaurant offers a decent happy hour selection of appetizers and sushi rolls that provides an excellent synopsis of the Kata Robata cuisine.
